statements: SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT question, correct_answer FROM Quizzes WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT question, user_answer FROM Quizzes WHERE grade < 50 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT correct_answer FROM Quizzes;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS Avg_Grade FROM Quizzes;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE grade >= 7.5 ORDER BY quiz_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT question, correct_answer FROM Quizzes WHERE grade <= 5.0 ORDER BY grade ASC
SELECT quiz_id, question FROM Quizzes WHERE grade < 10 AND grade > 3
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE user_answer IS NULL ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT MAX(grade), MIN(grade), AVG(grade) FROM Quizzes
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT question, correct_answer FROM Quizzes ORDER BY question DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, achieved_grade FROM Grades WHERE achieved_grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE grade < 50 ORDER BY grade ASC;
SELECT quiz_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM Quizzes GROUP BY quiz_id;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_answer FROM Quizzes WHERE question LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT quiz_id, question, correct_answer FROM Quizzes WHERE grade < 50 ORDER BY question ASC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(achieved_grade) AS average_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(achieved_grade) > 70 ORDER BY average_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(achieved_grade) AS total_grades FROM Grades WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM Grades WHERE achieved_grade > 90) GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_grades DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes;
SELECT question, grade FROM Quizzes WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT quiz_id, SUM(marks) AS total_marks FROM Answers GROUP BY quiz_id;
SELECT student_name, chosen_answer FROM Students JOIN Answers ON Students.student_id = Answers.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT question, correct_answer FROM Quizzes WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Answers WHERE marks < 70 ORDER BY marks ASC;

SELECT Students.student_name, Quizzes.question, Quizzes.grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Answers ON Students.student_id = Answers.student_id INNER JOIN Quizzes ON Answers.quiz_id = Quizzes.quiz_id ORDER BY Students.student_name, Quizzes.grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes;
SELECT quiz_name, start_time, end_time FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM Questions WHERE quiz_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Answers ORDER BY question_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, score FROM Grades WHERE quiz_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT * FROM Quizzes
SELECT quiz_name, start_time, end_time FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1
SELECT q.quiz_name, q.start_time, q.end_time, COUNT(qz.quiz_id) AS total_quizzes FROM Quizzes q JOIN Quizzes qz ON q.quiz_id = qz.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_id
SELECT q.quiz_name, AVG(g.score) AS avg_score FROM Quizzes q JOIN Grades g ON q.quiz_id = g.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_id
SELECT q.quiz_name, COUNT(DISTINCT g.student_id) AS total_students FROM Quizzes q JOIN Grades g ON q.quiz_id = g.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_id
SELECT * FROM Quizzes;
SELECT question, correct_answer FROM Quizzes;
SELECT student_name, overall_grade FROM Grades WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, overall_grade FROM Grades WHERE quiz_id = 2 ORDER BY overall_grade DESC;
SELECT quiz_topic FROM Quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes;
SELECT quiz_topic, question FROM Quizzes WHERE grade > 4.00;
SELECT student_name, overall_grade FROM Grades JOIN Students ON Grades.student_name = Students.student_name;
SELECT question_text, answer_text FROM Questions JOIN Answers ON Questions.question_id = Answers.question_id WHERE is_correct = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT quiz_topic FROM Quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
